markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Fetch Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2207)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Fetch stalkers form from the souls of Medium or Small [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69) or [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91) (Small fetch stalkers have the same statistics as Medium ones.)

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 43

**[Recall Knowledge - Plant](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 43

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Fetch_Stalker.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Fetch Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2207)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 612</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +32, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +32, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +36, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +33, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +31, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +34, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +6

**Con** +9

**Int** +4

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +8
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +35 

**Ref** +30 

**Will** +28 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 350

, regeneration 40 (deactivated by [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) or negative)

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272) 15, negative 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fetch weapon +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus 2d6 mental

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +32
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **3rd**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to or from the [First World](/Planes.aspx?ID=10) only)
- **8th**
[Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158)
- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Manifest Fetch Weapon** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** The fetch starts its turn; **Effect** A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-322" />
name: Fetch Stalker

Fetch stalkers form from the souls of Medium or Small  fey  or  humanoids  (Small fetch stalkers have the same statistics as Medium ones.)
</summary>

Recall Knowledge - Fey (Nature): DC 43 Recall Knowledge - Plant (Nature): DC 43 Unspecific Lore : DC 41 Specific Lore : DC 38 Fetch Stalker Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 612 Perception +30; darkvision Languages Common, Sylvan; tongues Skills Acrobatics +32, Athletics +32, Deception +36, Intimidation +34, Nature +33, Society +31, Stealth +34, Thievery +31 Str +6 Dex +6 Con +9 Int +4 Wis +6 Cha +8 --- AC 42 Fort +35 Ref +30 Will +28 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 350 , regeneration 40 (deactivated by fire or negative) Weaknesses cold iron 15, negative 15 --- Speed 35 feet, air walk Melee Single Action fetch weapon +35 (Agile, versatile B), Damage 3d8+14 slashing plus 2d6 mental Primal Innate Spells DC 40, attack +32 - Cantrips (9th) Produce Flame, Read Aura - 3rd Illusory Disguise (at will) - 7th Plane Shift (to or from the First World only) - 8th Illusory Creature - 9th Disjunction - Constant (9th) Air Walk, Tongues Manifest Fetch Weapon Free Action (Conjuration, Primal) Trigger The fetch starts its turn; Effect A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike.
